cross bone and skulls means its a certified trusted uploader.   if you see a skull, you know the upload is legit, without a doubt.

not sure what blue skull vs green skull means.  i'm guessing blue is affiliate of piratebay and green is a regular user.
blue is tpb helper   green means vip uploader and purple means trusted uploader
